name: Among Us Irl
description:
Information:

    Version 1.2.0 in Early Access

    Full credit to InnerSloth for using their game.

    Game assets found in https://www.spriters-resource.com/pc_computer/amongus/

How to play:

    Click the ➕ to create a server (Recommended on pc)

    Click  👩‍👧‍👧 icon to join the server on a nother device (Mobile phone)

    Type the code on the host device and press 📶

    Min of 4 people is needed to play the game

    On the host device press start

Rules:

    If your the impostor tap the kill button on someone elses phone to kill them

    The killed player needs to sit down until someone presses the report button on their screen

    When voting begins the person with most votes needs to press the kill button on their screen

    For a vote to be passed there needs to be more votes on the person than all other votes combined

    The game will do the rest
